name: bootstrap-responsive-grid
description: Define different gutters and container margins for each breakpoint when using Bootstrap.
author: Bence Szalai (bence@sbnc.eu)

scripts.css-compile-main: node-sass --importer=node_modules/node-sass-tilde-importer --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap -o dist/css/
scripts.css-minify-main: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css
